title: The WORST placement system.
body:
RIOT is so retarded... years after coming out with LoL and the morons still can't get matchmaking or placement right.
Win 8/10 games and place bronze 1? Seriously? RIOT is so garbage. 
On the bright side... Overwatch in two days. Woot. Abandon this garbage game and company foreva.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
Overwatch will never be as big as League...

Never..
you could get to silver 5 in 5-7 games if your way better then bronze.  If your actually better then the division you should be able to get out with a couple wins in a row to problem

Like trying to sell a romance novel to a science fiction buff because they're books.
